website_summaries.verdict: Unlike knives with metal blades, these ceramic blades will not rust. They can chip, however, if you use them to cut hard foods like nuts.
pros: Includes 6" chef knife with sheath, 5" utility knife, 3" paring knife with sheath, and a peeler
cons: May chip if you use to chop nuts

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, Very sharp, nice weight/balance, won't rust
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten a set for myself because they were very inexpensive and enjoyed them. Be careful, they are very sharp. Keep them with the covers on or you will get cut like I did. I liked them enough that I ordered a set for my Mom who lives at the beach because they won't rust like normal knives.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kroeker

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic knife set
customer_reviews.text: What a great knife set. The first time I used the little one I cut my finger but the knife is so sharp I didn't realize it until my potatoes were covered in blood. I love the blade covers. They keep the knives sharp and prevent them from getting dinged up in the drawer. Highly recommend (along with a box of bandaids).
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable set of ceramic knives
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Had them for about two moths after I broke our first set of a different brand. These held up well. Read reviews and suggestions all true. Really nice and durable. Would highly recommend for cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent knives, great price
customer_reviews.text: knives are great as is the peeler. I didn't give them a 5 star rating as the plastic that the knives slide into fit very snug, too much so. It isn't really a problem as you don't need to use the covers
customer_reviews.author: norwich34

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, and you will be too if you buy them
customer_reviews.text: My husband's favorite knives. I recommend these, mainly because he helps in the kitchen more because he likes these blades. Haha. I'm serious though. Cuts beautifully, and I love the sheathes they came with, helps to protect them in the drawer. Only con: I hand-wash these because I worry that the heat from the dishwasher will ruin them. Might not have to, but I'd rather be safe than sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnaire

customer_reviews.title: Great knives!
customer_reviews.text: This ceramic knife set is fantastic. I’ve purchased two sets for myself already and gifted a couple as well. The only downside is that ceramic knives cannot be sharpened but these stay sharp for a long time if you take care of them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Olivier

customer_reviews.title: Best knives you'll buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say these are some of the best knives I've ever had! I have Henckels knives sitting on my counter but I always use these. A word to the wise tho... don't chop nuts! I did and my knife chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, durable and sharp knives. Purchased as a gift and purchased a second set for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - fair price
customer_reviews.text: They are good quality ceramic knives. Very sharp and the rignt size.
customer_reviews.author: cler anders

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much that I bought a set for my sister!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: They work great, the sizes are handy
customer_reviews.text: Ok, first off, heed the warnings as to sharpness!!! I've cut myself twice already. They work great, the sizes are handy. Taking off a star because the handle end of the blade is a little too close and too "squared off", making it easier to cut yourself from that end. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: blahblah

customer_reviews.title: Best knives ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've head one for years and it still cuts extremely well. I finally found the same knife again and it is the same quality as the first one. I'm very happy with the purchase, easy to travel with (camping, BBQ, beach days, etc) with the included cover for the blade. I highly recommend these knives, I've even bought a set for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic is only way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Nive handles. Seem to be wearing good. Still extremely sharp after a few months of hard use
customer_reviews.author: K Redding

customer_reviews.title: they are a great set.
customer_reviews.text: These are the sharpest knives I've ever used. The are the ones I use primarily now, and I have some expensive knives. For the money, they are a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nomady

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the knives are awesome, the peeler is okay for some applications
customer_reviews.author: rayford henslee

customer_reviews.title: These are the best! I've had them for almost a year now
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! I've had them for almost a year now, and they're as sharp as when I bought them. They even cut slightly squishy tomatoes well - the sign of a good knife!
customer_reviews.author: Kajal Ravani

product_meta.title: Oster Ostead cutlery set, 1, Black
feature_bullets: Includes: 6-inch Chef with sheath, 5-inch Utility with sheath, 3-inch Paring with sheath and a Peeler
Great addition to any kitchen while adding a pop of color

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
